Command-Line Functions¶

aigean_metadata.aigean_metadata(filenames)

Extractin the metadata information from correct files, and show the uncorrect files name below

aigean_mosaic.aigean_mosaic(filelist[, ...])

Create a mosaic by giving multiple filenames.

aigean_today.aigean_today([instrument, saveplot])

Getting the latest image from the archive.
